name: T H I C C Wallet
author: urhotmom
notes: This season has been by far my worst. Lost my KoG promo 3 times, twice with Hazy and once with GB. Meta is all over the place, and this deck handles it ALL. Hazy of course is a tough match up but I never ran into on my L3 climb. Made this deck in one day starting with only one rocket and the floodgates.
